Key Match Events: Hardik Pandya scripted a stunning comeback to lead India to T20 World Cup glory
Jasprit Bumrah was Player of the Series
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma: 'This has to be my greatest achievement'
Rohit Sharma announces retirement from T20Is
Aiden Markram: 'Gutted for the time being, it'll take some time to reflect on a really good campaign, hurts quite a bit but incredibly proud'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The final is another match that exactly depicted how the tournament went... Group Stages were awesome, Super 8's were top notch until the last game in each grp and then the knock outs. What a tournament!!!
Others: The match was played at Kensington Oval, Bridgetown, Barbados
Virat Kohli was Player of the Match
Jasprit Bumrah was awarded the Most Valuable Player of the Match
The match was part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024
